data.pageTitle: London Platform User Group (LOPUG) 2024 - Michel Murabito
data.pageDescription: Michel Murabito talk's: Highlights from KubeCon Europe 2024
data.children: In this panel discussion we talked about the key takeaways from the event, covering its main content, emerging trends, and notable events. The session provided an in-depth overview of the latest developments in the Kubernetes ecosystem, sharing insights on the most significant presentations and discussions from KubeCon Europe 2024. It was an informative session that highlighted the evolving landscape of Kubernetes and its community.

schema.name: London Platform User Group (LOPUG) 2024
schema.description: At London Platform User Group (LOPUG) 2024, Michel Murabito delivered an insightful talk on Highlights from KubeCon Europe 2024
